SourceNetworkPath.defaultValue: General\Ammex\Sales\Sell Through Data Files\Ace\2022\Inventory and Order Projection
General\Ammex\Sales\Sell Through Data Files\Lowes\2022\Sales and Inventory

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Inbound'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
	  AND [SourceDatabase] = 'Customer'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = 'Ace' 
      AND [SourceObject] = 'CustomerAceInventoryAndOrder'
ORDER BY [SourceObject]

SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Inbound'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
	  AND [SourceDatabase] = 'Customer'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = 'Lowes' 
ORDER BY [SourceObject]

SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Inbound'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
	  AND [SourceDatabase] = 'Customer'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = 'OReilly' 
ORDER BY [SourceObject]

SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Inbound'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = 'OfficeDepot'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
ORDER BY [SourceObject]

SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Inbound'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
	  AND [SourceDatabase] = 'Customer'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = 'Staples'
